content.name: Running
content.description: Running is a high-impact aerobic exercise that strengthens muscles, improves cardiovascular health, and boosts mental well-being.

content.name: Cycling
content.description: Cycling is a low-impact exercise that enhances joint mobility, improves posture, and increases overall fitness levels.

content.name: Swimming
content.description: Swimming is a full-body workout that increases endurance, builds muscle strength, and maintains a healthy heart.

content.name: Indoor
content.description: Reading exercises the brain, enhances knowledge, reduces stress, and improves concentration and focus.

content.name: Walking
content.description: Walking is a simple yet effective exercise that helps maintain a healthy weight, strengthens bones, and boosts mood.
